about_the_game:
In Game of Fitna Vol. 1, you play as Zayn, a rank 100 student at the prestigious Wisdom Heaven school—the lowest of the low. One day, Zayn receives a cryptic message from the school administration, informing him of a crucial "TEST" that will determine his academic future. Along with six of his classmates, Zayn must navigate through this mysterious examination.

As you explore the hallowed halls of Wisdom Heaven, you'll have the opportunity to interact with your fellow students and uncover their unique personalities and motivations. Forge bonds and alliances, but be cautious—in this high-stakes game, trust is a fragile commodity.






In Game of Fitna, you'll encounter a cast of captivating characters, each with their own unique stories, struggles, and personal arcs. As the game progresses, you'll have the opportunity to delve deeper into their lives and understand what drives them.

From the mysterious and aloof to the outwardly friendly and charismatic, your classmates will keep you on your toes. As you interact with them, you'll uncover hidden layers and motivations that will make you question their true intentions.



-Over 9 hours of captivating story
-6 unique bad endings
-More than 40 hand-crafted CGs
-interesting presentation
-Rich and atmospheric setting
-Complex and captivating characters
-Haunting original soundtrack
-Thought-provoking moral dilemmas
-Engaging mechanics

And more!

short_description: Game of Fitna Vol. 1: A thrilling death game visual novel set in 2030. Play as Zayn, a high school student thrown into sinister survival games known as "TEST." Fight for your life, uncover shocking truths, and face intense moral dilemmas in this mature, thought-provoking experience.
